name: A Hat in Time - 3D collect-a-thon platformer
blurb: A Hat in Time is a 3D collect-a-thon platformer in the spirit of the classic Nintendo 64 titles you know and love!

rewards.reward: SPECIAL THANKS ==============================\r\nSpecial thanks on the website with your name, a CD-quality download of the game's main theme music, and a snazzy desktop wallpaper download! + our everlasting thanks!
GET VIRTUAL COPY OF THE GAME ==============================\r\nEARLY BIRD: Get the $15 reward for only $10!
GET VIRTUAL COPY OF THE GAME ==============================\r\nA digital copy of A Hat in Time for PC and Mac (Steam key) + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

GAME + EXCLUSIVE HAT ==============================\r\nAn exclusive in-game hat just for our amazing Kickstarter backers! (only people pledging for this reward will receive the hat and nobody else) + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

GAME + SOUNDTRACK + BOOKLET + POSTCARD ==============================\r\nDigital download of the game's soundtrack (with a special bonus theme remix track!), as well as a graphical instruction booklet in PDF format inspired by classic video game manuals! Also includes a Hat in Time postcard sent to you + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

2 COPIES OF THE GAME + BUTTONS ==============================\r\nGet a pair of very shiny A Hat in Time buttons + another virtual copy of the game to give to a friend + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

GAME + BETA (NO SHIPPING VERSION!)
==============================
This is the same as the other $40 reward tier, but without any physical goodies! Save the shipping!
In total: Beta access + 2 virtual copies of the game!
GAME + BETA ACCESS + POSTER ==============================\r\nBeta access and a Kickstarter exclusive super awesome poster!\r\n+ EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

PHYSICAL COPY OF THE GAME ==============================\r\nHatter's Box! A fantastic sparkly shrink-wrapped edition of the game you can hold in your hands (or attempt to wear as a hat) + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

GAME + BETA + ALPHA (NO SHIPPING VERSION!)
==============================
This is the same as the other $70 reward tier, but without any physical goodies! Save the shipping!
In total: Alpha access + Beta access + 2 virtual copies of the game!

PHYSICAL COPY OF GAME + T-SHIRT + ALPHA ACCESS + NAME IN CREDITS ==============================\r\nA Hat in Time T-Shirt, along with Alpha access and your name in the credits as "Supporter"!\r\n+ EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

GLOW-IN-THE-DARK SHIRT + EXTRA PHYSICAL COPY + NAME IN CREDITS ==============================\r\nChapter 2 too spooky shirt design that glows in the dark, an extra physical copy of the game that you can give to a friend, and your name in the credits as "Sponsor"! + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

LIMITED EDITION HAT KID FIGURINE
==============================
A figurine of Hat Kid! Now you can fight baddies in game and in real life! Whoa!!

+ EVERYTHING in previous rewards!

HOURGLASS NECKLACE + NAME IN CREDITS ==============================\r\nTim the Time Lord's Gold-plated hourglass necklace and your name in the credits as "Golden Sponsor"!\r\n+ EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!
DESIGN AN IN-GAME HAT ==============================\r\nBe a milliner! Help us design a new hat that Hat Kid can wear in the game + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

DESIGN AN IN-GAME NPC CHARACTER ==============================\r\nYour creation! Help us design a fully 3D modeled NPC character for use within the game! And your name in the credits as "Epic Sponsor"! + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!

DESIGN AN IN-GAME BONUS LEVEL ==============================\r\nTHANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!! Help us design a major part of a level. You get to decide the overall theme of a new level in the game! You will also get your name in the credits with a self-chosen title (as long as it's not offensive) + EVERYTHING in the previous rewards!
